meanings.definition: A diagnostic imaging technique used to visualize the kidneys and urinary tract.
meanings.sent1: The doctor ordered pyelograms to check my kidneys.
meanings.sent2: The technician reviewed the pyelograms to see the urinary tract clearly.
meanings.sent3: The pyelograms showed my kidneys in vivid detail, almost like a map.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of pyelograms, each image representing a different aspect of her health.
meanings.sent5: The pyelograms revealed the inner workings of the kidneys like a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: The resulting image produced by a pyelogram.
meanings.sent1: The pyelograms displayed a clear picture of the kidneys.
meanings.sent2: She studied the pyelograms carefully to understand the results.
meanings.sent3: The pyelograms looked like abstract art, with swirls and patterns.
meanings.sent4: His memories were like faded pyelograms, capturing moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The pyelograms captured the essence of the kidneys in a single frame.
